title: Liberty☆Liberty!
original_name: リバティ ☆ リバティ!
sinopse:
When Yaichi falls onto a trash heap dead drunk, he expects to be thrown out—but then a man comes to his rescue and Yaichi breaks his video camera. He feels so bad about it he decides to work off the debt; however, Yaichi is pretty useless. Can he really help out?

(Source: MU)
